77eba32a-35e4-4a63-8fd6-a8145bdb8dd0.notes: No fatigue bonus, no jumping bonus, doesn't affect skills

450d86a5-047d-4e02-84be-6dadeb16b7e1.name: Damage Resistance (Flexible; Tough Skin)
450d86a5-047d-4e02-84be-6dadeb16b7e1.notes: Flexible (-20%, doesn't protect against crushing damage); Tough Skin (-40%, doesn't protect against touch or scratches)

5d053ef2-3e82-4e06-b6dd-05208d4ac0ec.name: High Pain Threshold
5d053ef2-3e82-4e06-b6dd-05208d4ac0ec.notes: Never suffer shock penalties when injured

1ff78b96-e227-4a65-9dd5-b0c8b2b4ebde.text: The Half-Ogre is the offspring of an Ogre and an Orc Half-Ogres are rare. They resemble slender, hairy Ogres 6 to 7 feet tall.
